column1: #   RESOURCE_MEMORY_CONSUMPTION_ALERT_THRESHOLD - Memory usage percentage (0‑100) at which the script will increase allocated memory.
#   RESOURCE_STORAGE_CONSUMPTION_ALERT_THRESHOLD - Storage usage percentage (0‑100) at which the script will emit an alert.
# Note: Thresholds are percentages of total allocated resources.
# Lines starting with ‘#’ are treated as comments and ignored.
